job_title: Sr. Java Tech Lead & Sr. Java Developer
jd: From: jayaprakash, kksoftwareassociates.com jayaprakash.b@kksoftwareassociates.com Reply to: jayaprakash.b@kksoftwareassociates.com Title:Sr. Java Tech Lead & Sr. Java DeveloperLocation:Austin, TX - OnsiteDuration:Long-term Contract Job Description:Key Qualifications: • Minimum 10 years of experience in enterprise Java development • Strong foundation in Computer Science fundamentals such as data structures and algorithms • Hands-on programming experience with Java and J2EE, Java11 related technologies: Spring Framework, Spring Data, spring-boot, RESTful Services, JUnit/TestNG• Solid understanding of technologies such as Web Services, REST API, XML, JSON, HTTP, SSL, TCP/IP, Caching solutions, application performance tuning• Lead discussions and decisions regarding resolution of issues• Work collaboratively to contribute to achieving business outcomes• Excellent troubleshooting, problem-solving skills and the ability to design scalable, and maintainable software solutions.• Ability to communicate effectively-Self driven, have good communication skills, to take ownership on the project / deliverables• Experienced in delivering advanced solutions for a multi-tier, distributed web application with AWS knowledge and experience • Knowledge in the Object Oriented concepts, Java programming language, including understanding of its syntax, core libraries, and features• Experience in developing applications that utilize relational databases (e.g. Oracle) and other less structured data stores (NoSQL) • Have keen eye for quality and have great attitude towards work and ability to work collaboratively in a team environment
